name: correctness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being in agreement with the true facts or with what is generally accepted: He quickly proved the correctness of his findings. I began to question the correctness of his theory.
care to behave or speak in a way that is generally accepted and approved of: He speaks with such correctness that it sometimes sounds very formal. During the next few days I went about my duties with propriety and correctness. See
correct
